nodes.text: A memorial to the victims of the Great Hyperspace Disaster and its subsequent Emergences was proposed by Supreme Chancellor Lina Soh as one of her Great Works in the aftermath of the Battle of Kur. Announced by Soh at the dedication ceremony of the Starlight Beacon space station, the proposed memorial was intended to be a multi-piece sculpture with pieces situated in the Hetzal, Eriadu and Ab Dalis star systems, where the Disaster itself and some of the most damaging Emergences had occurred.
